title: Die Mercurii 23 Aprilis 1679. It is this day ordered by the Lords spiritual and temporal in Parliament assembled, that all such persons who have obtained leave, either from His Majesties Privy Council, or from this House, to come to, and stay in the Cities of London and Westminster, ...
author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Lords.
